blogPost.title: Elon Musk’s concern over Twitter bots may be a way to renege on his commitment to buy the company, explains @DoubleLJSquared #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/PoTPs3wwSM https://t.co/4n1ndV4nru
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: イーロン・マスクのTwitterボットへの懸念は、会社買収の約束を反故にするためかもしれない、と@DoubleLJSquaredが解説 #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/PoTPs3wwSM https://t.co/4n1ndV4nru。
Elon Musk对Twitter机器人的担忧可能是为了违背他收购公司的承诺，@DoubleLJSquared解释道#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/PoTPs3wwSM https://t.co/4n1ndV4nru
Elon Musk對Twitter機器人的擔憂可能是爲了違揹他收購公司的承諾，@DoubleLJSquared解釋道#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/PoTPs3wwSM https://t.co/4n1ndV4nru

previous.title: Finland and Sweden formally applied to join NATO, a move that signals a historic shift in European security. Both nations have been on a trajectory to increase their military spending. #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/JlpzDrRaAU https://t.co/czInoU3n7K

localize.full_text: フィンランドとスウェーデンがNATOへの加盟を正式申請、欧州安全保障の歴史的転換を示唆 両国とも軍事費を増加させる軌道に乗っている。#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/JlpzDrRaAU https://t.co/czInoU3n7K
芬兰和瑞典正式申请加入北约，此举标志着欧洲安全的历史性转变。这两个国家一直处于增加军事开支的轨道上。#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/JlpzDrRaAU https://t.co/czInoU3n7K
芬蘭和瑞典正式申請加入北約，此舉標誌着歐洲安全的歷史性轉變。這兩個國家一直處於增加軍事開支的軌道上。#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/JlpzDrRaAU https://t.co/czInoU3n7K

next.title: President Biden invoked the Defense Production Act to increase baby formula supply amid a growing shortage #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/5kH9Yd1VOF https://t.co/0dGDB168fd

localize.full_text: バイデン大統領は、不足が深刻化する中、国防生産法を発動し、赤ちゃんの粉ミルクの供給を増やした #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/5kH9Yd1VOF https://t.co/0dGDB168fd
拜登总统援引《国防生产法》，在日益短缺的情况下增加婴儿配方奶粉的供应#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/5kH9Yd1VOF https://t.co/0dGDB168fd
拜登總統援引《國防生產法》，在日益短缺的情況下增加嬰兒配方奶粉的供應#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/5kH9Yd1VOF https://t.co/0dGDB168fd
